alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 7:16AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilchrist, southern Bradford, Alachua, southwestern Union, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 715 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alachua, or 8 miles northwest of Gainesville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Trenton, Keystone Heights, Bell, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Alachua, High Springs, Hawthorne and Archer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
